text: Nikhil Baran Sengupta (13 December 1943 – 18 February 2014) was a Bangladeshi art director, actor, painter and production designer. He was known for his role in Janani (1984), Sahari Bagha (1985), Maa O Mamata, Suna Chadhei (1987), Jugantar, Tahader Katha, Bagh Bahadur (1989) and Mr. and Mrs. Iyer (2002). Sengupta died 18 February 2014 in Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India aged 70.Art director Nikhil Da’ passes away ==References== ==Other websites== * * Shri Nikhil Baran Sengupta at Srjan * Facebook link- https://www.facebook.com/nikhilbaran.sengupta/info Category:1943 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Bangladeshi painters Category:Bangladeshi movie actors Category:Set designers Category:People from Chittagong Division
title: Nikhil Baran Sengupta
